title: M7: Attention in the encoder
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: intermediate. * SUPERVISION: self-assessment. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 4 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: none. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: this question will make the student think on the differences between the encoder of a transformer, the decoder of a transformer, and a recurrent neural network in which attention may work differently.
